mapper.select: SELECT dn.id AS newspaperId, dn.header AS header FROM d_player dp, d_game dg, d_newspaper dn WHERE dp.user_id=#{userId} AND dp.game_id=dg.id AND dp.status != 9 AND dg.id=dn.game_id AND dn.status > 0 GROUP BY dn.id

SELECT dn.id AS newspaperId, dn.header AS header, dn.headline AS headline, dn.headline_body AS headlineBody, dn.subedition AS subedition, dn.important_notice AS importantNotice, dn.seat_table AS seatTable, dn.status AS status, dn.type AS type FROM d_newspaper dn WHERE dn.id = #{newspaperId}

SELECT dn.id AS newspaperId, dn.header AS header, dn.headline AS headline, dn.headline_body AS headlineBody, dn.important_notice AS importantNotice, dn.type AS type FROM d_newspaper dn WHERE dn.game_id = #{gameId} AND dn.status > 0 ORDER BY dn.id DESC LIMIT 1
